subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Justin Gatlin fell shy of his world-leading time in the 100 meters by 0.01 of a second, clocking 9.75 at the Golden Gala in Rome.
snippet: Justin Gatlin fell shy of his world-leading time in the 100 meters by 0.01 of a second, clocking 9.75 at the Golden Gala in Rome.
